scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, crowned and robed in blue, sits on a golden throne beneath a golden canopy. She holds the Christ Child, who is naked. To her left, an angel plays a harp, and another figure in white robes stands holding a book. To her right, another angel plays a flute. In the background, a castle with a tower is visible, along with trees and a blue sky. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
